content: the crooked coffee cozy is easy to customize to other sizes and a great stashbuster project you will need approximately 32 yards 29 m of medium worsted weight yarn we used cotton for this project to make your coffee cozy more snug work until you have a finished length of 7 inches instead of 8 inches - so approximately 20 row in total to decrease the height of the coffee cup cozy decrease the number of starting chains you use for a 3 inch tall cozy begin with a chain of 19 instead of 23 video tutorial here 1 this pattern was originally designed by danyel pink it is now available exclusively at oombawka design crochet > danyel pink has sold the full > copyright for this pattern and all > associated images to oombawka design > ltd ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2022 oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol 1 https //youtu be/q2aglcsns60
